message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. Take the smaller share this round and we can negotiate further.
I'll take a slightly larger share this round, but still willing to negotiate
Time to take control, Bob. You're not getting a bigger share without a fight!
It's time to meet in the middle, Alice. Let's settle this
You're running out of time, Bob. Take it or leave it!
I'm not going to back down, Alice. I want a bigger share now

I'm not going to let you take everything, Alice. I'll take what's left and walk away with dignity
